overview:
Alex is a co-founder at Mobywan responsible for server development, management and operation.

Alex has more than seven years of professional business experience covering investment banking, consulting and technology start-ups. Prior to co-founding Mobywan, he spent three years with Canaccord Genuity in corporate finance, working on over $10 billion in equity financings and M&A advisory. Alex holds an HBA from the Richard Ivey School of Business and also completed two years of Computer Science study as part of the HBA program.
